response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its true value, I propose to sell it to you for $120. This is an excellent opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price. If this offer suits you, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 120}
